name: Top Down Physics Game
description:
This is a prototype/ very early alpha for a passion project I'm slowly chipping away at. 

Features:

  • Wacky active ragdoll character
  • 3 unique weapons
  • Minor physics environment interaction (literally just some boxes and a door)
  • Some test training dummies that spawn WIP ragdolls when shot enough
  • Hut
  • Grabby hands
  • Bush
  • No UI yet (controls below)
  • Bugs, lots of bugs.

Controls

  • WASD movement.
  • Q/E specific control over corresponding arms
  • Left/Right Click corresponds to grabbing on each hand (hands become flat when grabbing because i kinda got lazy)
  • Primitive weapon selector: 1 - Unarmed, 2 - Pistol, 3 - Assault Rifle, 4 - Shotgun
  • No close button or anything so you will just have to use alt+f4 or something

Planned future features

  • AI
  • Story
  • Improved visuals
  • Sounds
  • A lot more
